column1: The '''''Tolkien Calendar 1990''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Unwin Hyman
column2: Unwin Paperbacks]] on [[24 August]] [[1989]]. It features art by [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
